data.name: Aethyric Insight
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Aethyric Pandemonium
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters.

data.name: Aethyric Ward
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Daemon monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Aimin' Quickly
data.description: Plink now builds up 1 seconds faster, but the cost is increased by 13 Action Points.

data.name: All By Meself
data.description: You deal 25% more damage when you have no pets present.

data.name: Apotheosis of Flesh
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters.

data.name: Apotheosis of Mind
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Apotheosis of Spirit
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Magical Beast, Dragonoid, and Forest Spirit monsters, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Ard Noggin
data.description: A powerful attack that deals 169 damage and reduces the threat generated by your pet's next attack.

data.name: Arrer O' Mork
data.description: Deals 1200 damage to all targets in front of you within 40 feet, and then deals an additional 1200 over 10 seconds.

data.name: Indigestion
data.description: You prod the inside of your Battle Squig, causing it to deal 100 Corporeal Damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you. The rancid juices cling to your foes, increasing the cooldowns of affected enemies by 1 second for each enemy you hit, to a maximum of 5 seconds. This effect lasts for 10 seconds.

data.name: Behind Ya!
data.note: Target must be facing away from you
data.description: A sneaky bow shot which deals 388 damage to the target.

data.name: Benediction of Morr
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters.

data.name: Benediction of the Dead
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Benediction of Winters
data.description: You deal 5% more damage to all enemy Undead monsters, and take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Tastes Like Stuntie
data.description: Your Battle Squig spies a tasty morsel and proceeds to take chunks out of your target for up to 5 seconds, dealing 244 damage with each hit. You share in this treat and will be healed for all damage this ability deals.

data.name: Big Claw
data.description: You force your Battle Squig to claw at your target, dealing 318 damage over 9 seconds and snaring them by 40% over 9 seconds.

data.name: Bolster War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted buff. Increases damage done by that siege engine by 2% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Boon of Persistence
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Boon of Tenacity
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Boon of the Impalpable
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Dwarf, Elf, or Human monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Bounce
data.description: You cause your Battle Squig to bounce, dealing 169 damage and knocking your target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Choking Arrer
data.description: A Crippling shot that deals 241 damage and silences your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 75 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Clever Shootin'
data.description: All of your Path of Big Shootin' abilities cost 35% fewer action points.

data.name: Sneaky Git
data.description: Sneaky Strike will now also increase your chance to defend attacks by 15%.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: Cunning Assault
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Evasion
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%.

data.name: Cunning Stratagem
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Skaven monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Cut Ya!
data.description: An Ailment which deals 505 damage over 15 seconds.

data.name: Da Smell Don't Bother Me
data.description: While in your Squig Armor, you are healed for 120 health every 5 seconds.

data.name: Da Waaagh Iz Strong
data.description: Increases durations of Yer Bleeding to 24s, Stop Runnin to 15s, and Not So Fast! to 15s.

data.name: Diminish War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Decreases damage done by that siege engine to 98% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Don't Eat Me
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Don't Hit Me!
data.description: You lash out at your target, dealing 169 damage and interrupting any ability that they are building up.

data.name: Drop That!!
data.description: On the Squig's next attack, it will deal an additional 194 damage and disarm your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: 'Ere, Squiggy!
data.description: When you are dealt damage, there is a 25% chance that 50% of the damage is dealt to your Squig, if it is within 45 feet.

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Explodin' Arrer
data.description: An Ailment which deals 133 Elemental damage to your target and then explodes, dealing an additional 165 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to the target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Farty Squig
data.description: You cause your pet to explode, dealing 419 damage to enemies within 30 feet. For the next 10 seconds, the next different squig other than the one that just exploded will be summoned instantly.

data.name: Favour of the Gods
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Favour of the Mad
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%, and you take 5% less damage from them. As long as you are attacking a monster of this type, your abilities will cool down 2 seconds faster.

data.name: Favour the Daemonic
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Beastmen monsters by 5%.

data.name: Finish 'em Off
data.description: Deals 782 damage if your target is below 30% hit points, or 351 damage otherwise.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any silencing, disarming, rooting, snaring effects and your abilities will build 50% faster and may not be set back.

data.name: Gas Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a Gas squig pet which you can order around. This pet attacks from range, but is very weak to attacks.
This pet receives a bonus to Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill equal to your bonus from items.
Your range is increased by 10% as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Git Em!
data.description: You and your Squig attack together on each others target. You strike your target for 94 damage, and your pet strikes its target for 119 damage. If you are within 35 feet of your pet's target, you will also strike that enemy for 94 damage, and likewise, if your pet is within 35 feet of your target, it will also strike your enemy for 119 damage as well.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Hamper War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Increases the cooldown times of that siege engine by 50% for 10 seconds

data.name: Harrier's Ken
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them. You will gain 50% more experience from these enemies.

data.name: Harrier's Pelt
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you, and you take 5% less damage from them.

data.name: Harrier's Savagery
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Animal monster before it will attack you.

data.name: He's A Biggun'
data.description: Your summoned Squig's Strength and Toughness are increased by 160

data.name: Horned Squig
data.note:
You may only have 1 active pet
Pet is castable on the move, has its cooldown reduced to 15s, has its cast time reduced to 50%, and takes less aoe damage while in Squig Armor.
data.description:
Summons a Horned squig pet which you can order around. This pet deals more damage than a basic squig. It is strong against physical attacks, but weak against magic.
This pet receives a bonus to Strength and Weapon Skill equal to your Ballistic Skill bonus from items. This pet receives a bonus to Toughness and Wounds that is 50% of your bonus from items.
Your armor is increased by the amount of armor gained from items as long as your squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: I Feelz Yer Pain
data.description:
Any time you critically hit with a Path of Big Shootin' ability, you will regain 50 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: I Got Lots
data.description: Your Squig pets no longer have cooldown times.

data.name: Squig Leap
data.note:
Requires Squig Armor
You cannot perform this action while rooted
You cannot perform this action while stunned
data.description: You pounce forwards, leaping towards your target. You will inflict 160 damage to them when you land. This ability cannot be used while you are airborne.

data.name: KABOOM!
data.description: Your Battle Squig explodes, causing you to be launched upward out of your Squiggy armor. All enemies within 30 feet take 304 damage and are knocked back.

data.name: Lots o' Arrers
data.description: You concentrate on your target for up to 3 seconds, repeatedly shooting them for 97 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Lots Of Shootin'
data.description: Deals 2400 damage to all targets within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Masterful Aim
data.description: Increases your Ballistic Skill by 160

data.name: Not So Fast!
data.description: A Crippling shot that deals 191 damage and reduces your target's Initiative by 50-80 for 10 seconds. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Clever
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Cunning
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you, and any abilities used against them will cost 10% less action points.

data.name: Outmaneuver the Dim
data.description: You can approach 50% closer to an enemy Greenskin monster before it will attack you.

data.name: Pick On Yer Own Size
data.description: Increases your Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Weapon Skill by 138, but reduces your Toughness by 138. (At RR100)

data.name: Pierce Defenses
data.description: If an enemy blocks, dodges, or parries any of your attacks, their chances to block, dodge, and parry will be reduced by 15% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Plink
data.description: A well aimed arrow that deals 320 damage.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Poison Arrer
data.description: Deals 653 Corporeal damage to your target.

data.name: Rotten Arrer
data.description: An Ailment which deals 561 damage to your target over 9 seconds and causes all healing effects used on them to become 50% weaker. Only usable on a target that is already Ailing.

data.name: Run Away!
data.description: You command your Squig to Taunt all enemies within 30 feet and increases your movement speed by 30% for 10 seconds.

data.name: RUN AWAY!
data.description: Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that your movement speed will be increased by 30% for 5 seconds.

data.name: Run 'n Shoot
data.description: Deals 166 damage to your target. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Sharp Toofs
data.description: Git Em!'s damage is increased to 419 on your pet's first attack, and its cost is reduced by 15 Action Points.

data.name: Sharpened Arrers
data.description: Explodin Arrer now deals 183 damage to the initial enemy, and 429 damage over 9 seconds with its explosion.

data.name: Shoot Thru Ya
data.description: A piercing arrow which deals 237 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away. This ability will continue to build up even if you move.

data.name: Shootin' Wif Da Wind
data.description: Increases the ranges of all Path of Quick Shootin' abilities by 50%.

data.name: Shrapnel Arrer
data.description: On contact, your arrow explodes in to shrapnel, dealing 153 damage to your target and reduces range on their abilities to 75% for the next 3 seconds.

data.name: Sky Titan's Bulwark
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Favor
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%.

data.name: Sky Titan's Strength
data.description: Increases your chances to defend against attacks made by enemy Ogre, Troll, and Giant monsters by 5%, and increases your chance to critically hit them by 5%. As long as you are attacking an enemy of this type, you gain Morale 25% faster.

data.name: Sneaky Stabbin
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Soothin' Mushroom Wrap
data.description: While within 100 feet of you, your group member's actions cost 50% less AP for 10 seconds.

data.name: Spiked Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a Spiked squig pet which you can order around. This pet attacks from range and has increased damage.
This pet receives a bonus to Ballistic Skill equal to 150% of your bonus from items. This pet receives a bonus to Weapon Skill equal to 50% of your bonus from items.
You gain the ability to autoattack while moving, and your chance to critically hit is increased by 5% as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Splinterin' Arrers
data.description: Run 'N Shoot will now also damage all enemies within 20 feet of your target, but damage is reduced by 30%.

data.name: Squig Armor
data.description:
Summons a massive battle squig which will promptly eat you. From within the battle squig, you can poke and prod it to move it around and make it attack.
While in your Squig Armor; your Ballistic Skill from items also counts as Strength, your Ranged Power from items also counts as Melee Power, and your Ranged Critical chance from items also counts as Melee Critical chance.

data.name: Squig Frenzy
data.description: You whip your pet in to a frenzy, causing it to do 50% more auto attack damage for 30 seconds.

data.name: Squig Goo
data.description: Targeted AE attack that deals 900 over 9 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet, and snares the targets by 60%.

data.name: Squigbeast
data.description: Pet Buff. Triples pet damage output and increases the size of your pet for 15 seconds.

data.name: Stabbity
data.description: Deals 169 damage to your target.

data.name: Sticky Squigz
data.description: All enemies within 30 feet become snared, reducing movement speed by 40% for the next 10 seconds. You are knocked back away from your enemies.

data.name: Stop Runnin!
data.description: An Ailment which deals 191 damage and snares your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds. This ability will continue to build up if you move.

data.name: Strength In Numbas
data.description:
Any time one of your groupmates within 100 feet of you hits an enemy, there is a 25% chance that you will regain 100 points of Morale over 3 seconds.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Summon Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a basic squig pet which you can order around. This pet is very tough, and can take quite beating.
This pet receives bonuses to Toughness and Wounds equal to your bonus from items.
This squig generates much more hatred in enemy monsters than normal.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Tastes Like Chicken
data.description: You eat your squig, gaining 441 health. For the next 10 seconds, the next different squig other than the one that was just eaten will be summoned instantly.

data.name: Too Smart For Dat
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.

data.name: Unshakable Focus
data.description: Removes and ignores all taunts and detaunts against you for 7 seconds.

data.name: What Blocka?
data.description: An attack which deals 216 damage and reduces your target's armor by 618-990 and reduces their chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Whazat Behind You?!
data.description:
Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that you will Detaunt the enemy, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 75% damage to you for 5 seconds.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Outta My Way!
data.description: Channeled. You kick deep down your Squig's throat, causing it to rage. Its speed is increased by 75% for the next 10 seconds, as you plow through any enemies who dare stand in your way

data.name: Yer Bleedin'!
data.description: An Ailment which deals 675 damage to your target over 15 seconds.

data.name: Wind Up Da Waaagh
data.note: Using this morale places all other morales on a 5m cooldown.
data.description: Deals 1600-2400 damage (scales with points in Path of Bouncin') to all targets within 30 feet of you.

data.name: Sneaky Strike
data.description: A sly attack which deals 294 damage to your enemy, and increases your Armor by 618-990 for 15s.

data.name: Big Bouncin'
data.description: You force your Battle Squig to bounce in the air for up to 3 seconds, repeatedly dealing 119 damage to all enemies within 30 feet.

data.name: Really Bad Gas!
data.description: Your Battle Squig evacuates a disagreeable meal, producing a toxic cloud that inflicts 210 Corporeal damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds.
